sn35.174-176:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, anatta, tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.174-176:1.3: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, anatta; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.174-176:1.4: jivha anatta; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.174-176:1.5: mano anatta; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.174-176:1.6: Yo, bhikkhave, anatta tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
